the linear quotient hash code a new method of hashcode is present and is shown to possess desir attributspecif the algorithm is simpl effici and exhaust while needlittl time per probe and us few probe per lookupperform data and implement hint ar also given cacm novemb1970 bell j r kaman c h hash hash codescatter storag calcul address search tabl lookup symbol tabl kei3 74 4 9 ca701105 jb februari 10 1978 833 am 1676 4 1973 1682 4 1973 1728 41973 1860 4 1973 1860 4 1973 1973 4 19731973 4 1973 1973 4 1973 1973 4 1973 19924 1973 1992 4 1973 2018 4 1973 2018 41973 2018 4 1973 2032 4 1973 2033 4 19732033 4 1973 2107 4 1973 2107 4 1973 21094 1973 2109 4 1973 2138 4 1973 2203 41973 2203 4 1973 2203 4 1973 2203 4 19732251 4 1973 2251 4 1973 2251 4 1973 22514 1973 2359 4 1973 2524 4 1973 2530 41973 2537 4 1973 2543 4 1973 2543 4 19732543 4 1973 2543 4 1973 2552 4 1973 25594 1973 2559 4 1973 2573 4 1973 2573 41973 2770 4 1973 2770 4 1973 2974 4 19732991 4 1973 2991 4 1973 3053 4 1973 30534 1973 3053 4 1973 3083 4 1973 1785 51973 1786 5 1973 1973 5 1973 1973 5 19731973 5 1973 2107 5 1973 2109 5 1973 22515 1973 2534 5 1973 2543 5 1973 2559 51973 2770 5 1973 3053 5 1973 3083 5 1973830 6 1973 1328 6 1973 1329 6 1973 17856 1973 1785 6 1973 1785 6 1973 1785 61973 1786 6 1973 1786 6 1973 1786 6 19731787 6 1973 1869 6 1973 1959 6 1973 19736 1973 1973 6 1973 1973 6 1973 1973 61973 1973 6 1973 1973 6 1973 1973 6 19731992 6 1973 1992 6 1973 332 6 1973 20186 1973 2018 6 1973 2107 6 1973 2107 61973 2107 6 1973 2107 6 1973 2107 6 19732109 6 1973 2109 6 1973 2109 6 1973 21096 1973 2111 6 1973 2182 6 1973 2412 61973 2543 6 1973 2543 6 1973 2552 6 19732673 6 1973 2673 6 1973 2707 6 1973 27706 1973 799 6 1973
